post.content:
The question is not clear enough....however,...

I thought about some concerns and questions..

**  House **

1. There are many different types of residences. For example,
   there are Detached, Semi-detached, Town-house(Villa ?),Condomini줄이    
2. The price of house varies depending on Location (area).

3. The average house price in Greater Toronto area is somewhere
    between $250,000 - $300,000 (guessing).

4. It is a common practice to make a 25% downpayment and
   the rest is financed (Mortgage) by a bank if you are qualified.
   (Less down payment means more monthly Mortgage payment.)

5. When you buy a commercial or business, generally you need to
   put more down payment than residential. (about 33 % minimum.)


** business **

1. I have No knowledge about the price of a business,
   it all depends on the sales, expense, in consequence, the profit.

2. Are you capable of running a business as a new comer ?
   i.e. Communication, Culture, business Know-How ?

3. What kind of fast food store are you thinking of ?
   i.e. Sandwich, Coffee, etc

4. The destination you are moving to is NOT known to me, however,
   generally, again generally, a bigger city has a better
   chance of surviving or success.

   Also it will cost relatively more for you to acquire a business.


5. In case , you are NOT ready to do any business immediately,
   do you have enough budget to survive 1 or 2 years until you are
   ready or confident to do anything.
  

These are few things I thought about...there could be more..

Please try to be specific with your questions.

I hope it is some help to you.

Thanks.  SK
